= New development version 3.15.2 =

== Changes since last version ==
  * cookies are now really stored and re-used
  * better handling of foreign languages, Hungary and Romania added

= New development version 3.15.1 (still operational) =

== Changes since last version ==
  * merge changes 3.14.5 to 3.14.6 (hotfix)
  * cookies are now stored on disk again, in YAML format

= Development version 3.15.0 =

Does not work any longer due to 2011-10-06 site update!

= Fixes (after 3.14.7) =
  * issue 138: obsoleted by fixes for issues 198 and 205
  * issue 162: more frequent refreshes for "young" caches
  * issue 191: freeze file cache: don't overwrite cache descriptions
  * issue 198: early login
  * issue 205: extract own found date from user search page
  * issue 210: support for all date formats, and languages other than English (no Korean and Hungarian though)
  * issue 216: support for multiple output formats in one go

= Get it: =
  * _The built-in version check won't show that an update is available._
  * *{{{svn checkout http://geotoad.googlecode.com/svn/branches/steve8x8/ geotoad-devel}}}*
  * packages available from download area (tagged "Development" - select "All downloads")
